body.name: Steamer for Clothes, 1400W Handheld Garment Steamer, Portable Fabric Wrinkles Remover with Fast Heat-up, Auto-Off, 260ml Water Tank, Fabric Brush, Clothing Steamer Iron for Home
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 29 mins
features: 【Removes Wrinkles Efficiently】Sundu 1400w powerful handheld steamer features 20s fast heat up and produces 25g/min steam output and is safe to use on all fabrics. Unique stainless steel heating panel ensures anti-rust, strong and durability. This can help to be faster and most effective in removing tough wrinkles on any fabric from cotton, wool, silk, linen, nylon and fiber.

【Easy to Operate】 Our steamer for clothes has 2 steam modes to choose from. The first-level steam mode can generate 20g/min steam and the second-level one can produce 25g/min steam burst, which can thoroughly penetrate the fabric and eliminate the hardest wrinkles, so as to achieve the ironing effect. With the lock switch, simple to lock the trigger for a continuous flow of steam.

【Portable And Compact Size】This compact travel steamer is lightweight and easy to move and use. Perfect for home travel, business trips, vacations, and destination weddings. Smooth and de-wrinkle delicate clothing quickly, safely, and gently.

【No-Splling at Any Angle】The newest electronic pump system ensures the steamer won't leak or spill. You can use it at any angle, whether you steam clothes horizontally or vertically. Coming with the fabric brush, you can easily soften, refresh, and de-wrinkle a wide range of fabrics including clothing, delicates, bedding, curtains, carpet, furniture and more.

【Large Water Tank】The large detachable 260ml/8.79oz water tank for easier filling can support about 20 minutes of continuous steaming, portable to use. The clothes steamer with an ultra-long 8.2ft/2.5m cord provides maximum reach and convenience.

【Safe Auto-off Protection】This handheld garment steamer has an auto-off function, and it will automatically turn off after 8mins of inactivity. And when the clothing steamer iron temperature is too high or the water level is too low, it will automatically shut down to ensure your safety

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for vertical ironing
reviews.reviewText: I recently added this to my arsenal of home appliances, and it has exceeded my expectations! This portable fabric wrinkles remover is a game-changer for anyone who values a quick and effective solution for keeping clothes looking pristine.The 1400W power ensures a fast heat-up time, allowing me to tackle wrinkles in no time. The handheld design adds to its convenience, making it easy to maneuver around different fabrics and garments. What sets it apart is its portability – perfect for both home use and on-the-go touch-ups.I love the versatility it offers, effortlessly removing wrinkles from a variety of fabrics without the need for an ironing board. The steamer's efficiency and ease of use make it a must-have for anyone looking to streamline their garment care routine.Bid farewell to traditional irons and welcome this handheld garment steamer into your life. It's a powerful and portable solution that delivers professional results. Highly recommended for those who want a quick and efficient way to keep their clothes looking fresh and wrinkle-free!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer works pretty well. I filled the tank halfway and ran it for the first time in my shower to test it out first. The instructions say to run it into air the first time to run off any manufacturing chemicals- like what would happen with any new appliance that heats up. But the smell wasn’t bad I barely noticed.It shoots out a good amount of steam and has about a 4 foot reach. You hear a slight clicking noise as the straw in the water tank sucks up water but it’s pretty quiet. The cord base is on a swivel ball so it’s easy to move the device around when in use. A nice feature is that the trigger handle can lock in place so you don’t have to hold it down with your finger while doing large areas. With about half a tank of water it lasted about 20 minutes, maybe a little longer I didn’t time it, but it did seem like a long time. If you were doing curtains you could probably get most of them done in your house in one go. It did turn itself off after it ran out of water. The entire head of this device does get hot, clear down to right above the handle. But it’s not hot enough to burn you like it can still be touched safely- except the front part of course. This is a great steamer and I’m glad I got it!

reviews.reviewText: The steamer is bigger than i imagined however its extremely light which we love. The bigger size covers more area at a time so its a plus. The color is beautiful, quickly heats and the auto shut off technology is extremely useful. Overall a great quality product.
